00001 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00002 /// @file         CTreeTracerSelector.cpp
00003 ///
00004 /// @author       Bob Buehler, Matt Dissinger, and Ray Myers
00005 ///
00006 /// @compiler     Windows: MinGW / Linux: GNU G++
00007 ///
00008 /// @project      GNAT
00009 ///
00010 /// @description  This file contains the implementation of the
00011 ///               CTreeTracerSelector class.  This class is the encapsulation
00012 ///               of all the tracers as well as the user interface to select
00013 ///               them and the parameters.
00014 ///
00015 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00016 #include "CTreeTracerSelector.h"
00017 #include "CGeneralMTracer.h"
00018 #include <QComboBox>
00019 #include <QMenu>
00020 #include <QSpinBox>
00021 #include <QLabel>

00023 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00024 /// CTreeTracerSelector::CTreeTracerSelector
00025 ///
00026 /// @description    This is the constructor of the CTreeTracerSelector class. It
00027 ///                 uses parent to continue in creating the QObject tree.
00028 /// @pre            None
00029 /// @post           The default values for the stored trace, and style are set
00030 ///                 and the CTreeSelector is initialized and connected to the
00031 ///                 retrace() slot.
00032 ///
00033 /// @param parent:  This is a pointer to the parent QObject.
00034 ///
00035 /// @limitations    None
00036 ///
00037 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00038 CTreeTracerSelector::CTreeTracerSelector( QObject *parent )
00039 {
00040     // Initialize Widgets.
00041     m_aiConfigMenu = new QMenu;
00042     m_depthSelector = new QSpinBox;
00043     m_qsDepthSelector = new QSpinBox;
00044     m_aiLabel = new QLabel;
00045     m_aiConfigButton = new QToolButton();
00046 
00047     // Set default search parameters
00048     m_traceConf.s_isID = false;
00049     m_traceConf.s_isDL = false;
00050     m_traceConf.s_isAB = false;
00051     m_traceConf.s_isHT = false;
00052     m_traceConf.s_isQS = false;
00053     m_traceConf.s_allowSSS = true;
00054 
00055     // Enable / disable widgets accordingly.
00056     m_qsDepthSelector->setEnabled(m_traceConf.s_isQS);
00057     m_depthSelector->setEnabled(m_traceConf.s_isDL);
00058 
00059     // Set the ranges of the spin boxes.
00060     setupDepthList();
00061     setupQSDepthList();
00062 
00063 
00064     // Configure ai config menu button.
00065     m_aiConfigButton->setMenu( m_aiConfigMenu );
00066     m_aiConfigButton->setIcon( QIcon(":/ai.png" ));
00067     m_aiConfigButton->setPopupMode( QToolButton::InstantPopup );
00068 
00069     // When menu is activated, trace should be redone.
00070     //connect( m_aiConfigMenu, SIGNAL( activated(int) ), this, SLOT( activate() ) );
00071 
00072     // When depth are changed, trace should be redone.
00073     connect( m_depthSelector, SIGNAL( valueChanged(int) ),
00074              this, SLOT( activate() ) );
00075     connect( m_qsDepthSelector, SIGNAL( valueChanged(int) ),
00076              this, SLOT( activate() ) );
00077 
00078     // Setup ai config menu.
00079     m_aiConfigMenu->setTitle("AI Config");
00080     setupConfigMenuActions();
00081     updateLabel();
00082 
00083 }
00084 
00085 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00086 /// CTreeTracerSelector::activate
00087 ///
00088 /// @description  Updates the label to reflect current search
00089 /// @pre          m_aiLabel has been initialized.
00090 /// @post         m_aiLabel now contains a meaningfull search description.
00091 ///
00092 /// @limitations  None
00093 ///
00094 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00095 void CTreeTracerSelector::updateLabel() const
00096 {
00097     QString newLabel = "";
00098     if(m_traceConf.s_isHT) newLabel += "HT";
00099     if(m_traceConf.s_isQS) newLabel += "QS";
00100     if(m_traceConf.s_isAB) newLabel += "AB";
00101     if(m_traceConf.s_isID) newLabel += "ID";
00102     if(m_traceConf.s_isDL) newLabel += "DLM";
00103     else newLabel += "Minimax";
00104     m_aiLabel->setText(newLabel);
00105 }
00106 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00107 /// CTreeTracerSelector::~CTreeTracerSelector
00108 ///
00109 /// @description  This is the destructor for the CTreeTracerSelector class which
00110 ///               frees up dynamically allocated memory.
00111 /// @pre          None
00112 /// @post         The tracers are deleted if any exist.
00113 ///
00114 /// @limitations  None
00115 ///
00116 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00117 CTreeTracerSelector::~CTreeTracerSelector()
00118 {
00119     while( !m_tracers.isEmpty() )
00120         delete m_tracers.takeFirst();
00121 }
00122 
00123 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00124 /// CTreeTracerSelector::activate
00125 ///
00126 /// @description  This function merely emits the activated signal. It is used to
00127 ///               combine and forward the activated signal from the different
00128 ///               QWidgets.
00129 /// @pre          None
00130 /// @post         The tracers are deleted if any exist.
00131 ///
00132 /// @limitations  None
00133 ///
00134 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00135 void CTreeTracerSelector::activate()
00136 {
00137     emit activated();
00138 }

00233 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00234 /// CTreeTracerSelector::setupDepthList
00235 ///
00236 /// @description  Performas all initialization steps for the depth selector.
00237 /// @pre          None
00238 /// @post         The spin box for depth is restricted to the values from 0 to
00239 ///               255.
00240 ///
00241 /// @limitations  None
00242 ///
00243 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00244 void CTreeTracerSelector::setupDepthList()
00245 {
00246     m_depthSelector->setMinimum( 1 );
00247     m_depthSelector->setMaximum( 255 );
00248 }
00249 
00250

00252 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00253 /// CTreeTracerSelector::setupQSDepthList
00254 ///
00255 /// @description  Performas all initialization steps for the QS depth selector.
00256 /// @pre          None
00257 /// @post         The spin box for qs depth is restricted to the values from 0
00258 ///               to 255.
00259 ///
00260 /// @limitations  None
00261 ///
00262 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00263 void CTreeTracerSelector::setupQSDepthList()
00264 {
00265     m_qsDepthSelector->setMinimum( 0 );
00266     m_qsDepthSelector->setMaximum( 255 );
00267 }
00268 
00269 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00270 /// CTreeTracerSelector::trace
00271 ///
00272 /// @description  This is a forwarding function that encapsulates the interface
00273 ///               with the tracers. Calling it will call the trace() function
00274 ///               on the currently selected tracer and it will pull the depth
00275 ///               and qs depth values from the spin boxes.
00276 /// @pre          None
00277 /// @post         The trace is returned as determined by the selector widgets'
00278 ///               current states.
00279 ///
00280 /// @param rootNode: This is the root of the tree that is to be traced.
00281 ///
00282 /// @return STreeTrace *: This is the trace generated by the ITreeTracer
00283 ///                       subclass.
00284 ///
00285 /// @limitations  None
00286 ///
00287 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00288 STreeTrace *CTreeTracerSelector::trace( const STreeNode *rootNode ) const
00289 {
00290     int depth = m_depthSelector->value();
00291     int qsDepth = m_qsDepthSelector->value();
00292     updateLabel();
00293     return m_generalTracer.trace( rootNode, depth, qsDepth, m_traceConf );
00294 }
00295 
00296 
00297 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00298 /// CTreeTracerSelector::toggleID
00299 ///
00300 /// @description  Toggles Iterative Deepening on/off
00301 /// @pre          None
00302 /// @post         Value of m_traceConf.s_isID is changed. If it was changed to
00303 ///               true, Depth Limited is also turned on. Trace is updated.
00304 ///
00305 /// @limitations  None
00306 ///
00307 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00308 void CTreeTracerSelector::toggleID()
00309 {
00310     bool b = !m_traceConf.s_isID;
00311     m_traceConf.s_isID = b;
00312 
00313     if(b && !m_traceConf.s_isDL)
00314     {
00315         m_actionDL->setChecked(true);
00316         activate();
00317     }
00318 
00319     if(m_traceConf.s_isDL)
00320     {
00321         activate();
00322         m_aiConfigButton->showMenu();
00323     }
00324 }
00325 
00326 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00327 /// CTreeTracerSelector::toggleDL
00328 ///
00329 /// @description  Toggles Depth Limited on/off
00330 /// @pre          None
00331 /// @post         Value of m_traceConf.s_isDL is changed. If it was changed to
00332 ///               false, Iterative Deepening and Quiessence Search are also
00333 ///               turned off. Trace is updated.
00334 ///
00335 /// @limitations  None
00336 ///
00337 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00338 void CTreeTracerSelector::toggleDL()
00339 {
00340     bool b = !m_traceConf.s_isDL;
00341     m_depthSelector->setEnabled(b);
00342     m_traceConf.s_isDL = b;
00343 
00344     if(!b && m_traceConf.s_isID)
00345     {
00346         m_actionID->setChecked(false);
00347     }
00348     if(!b && m_traceConf.s_isQS)
00349     {
00350         m_actionQS->setChecked(false);
00351     }
00352 
00353 
00354 
00355     // If DL has just been toggled manually, not a a prereq to something else.
00356     if(!m_traceConf.s_isID && !m_traceConf.s_isQS)
00357     {
00358         activate();
00359         m_aiConfigButton->showMenu();
00360     }
00361 
00362 }
00363 
00364 
00365 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00366 /// CTreeTracerSelector::toggleAB
00367 ///
00368 /// @description  Toggles Alpha Beta Pruning on/off
00369 /// @pre          None
00370 /// @post         Value of m_traceConf.s_isAB is changed. Trace is updated.
00371 ///
00372 /// @limitations  None
00373 ///
00374 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00375 void CTreeTracerSelector::toggleAB()
00376 {
00377     bool b = !m_traceConf.s_isAB;
00378     m_traceConf.s_isAB = b;
00379     activate();
00380     m_aiConfigButton->showMenu();
00381 }

00397     activate();
00398     m_aiConfigButton->showMenu();

00401 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00402 /// CTreeTracerSelector::toggleQS
00403 ///
00404 /// @description  Toggles Quiessence Search on/off
00405 /// @pre          None
00406 /// @post         Value of m_traceConf.s_isQS is changed. If it was changed to
00407 ///               true, Depth Limited is also turned on. Trace is updated.
00408 ///
00409 /// @limitations  None
00410 ///
00411 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00412 void CTreeTracerSelector::toggleQS()
00413 {
00414     bool b = !m_traceConf.s_isQS;
00415     m_qsDepthSelector->setEnabled(b);
00416     m_traceConf.s_isQS = b;
00417 
00418     if(b && !m_traceConf.s_isDL)
00419     {
00420         m_actionDL->setChecked(true);
00421     }
00422 
00423     if(m_traceConf.s_isDL)
00424     {
00425         activate();
00426         m_aiConfigButton->showMenu();
00427     }
00428 }

00430 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00431 /// CTreeTracerSelector::toggleSSS
00432 ///
00433 /// @description  Toggles Single Successor Shortcut on/off
00434 /// @pre          None
00435 /// @post         Value of m_traceConf.s_allowSSS is changed. Trace is updated.
00436 ///
00437 /// @limitations  None
00438 ///
00439 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00440 void CTreeTracerSelector::toggleSSS()
00441 {
00442     m_traceConf.s_allowSSS = !m_traceConf.s_allowSSS;
00443     activate();
00444     m_aiConfigButton->showMenu();
00445 }

00447 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00448 /// CTreeTracerSelector::setupConfigMenuActions
00449 ///
00450 /// @description  Initializes AI config menu
00451 /// @pre          m_aiConfigMenu has just been initialized to an empty menu.
00452 /// @post         m_aiConfigMenu now contains appropriate configuration options
00453 ///               and is set to pop back up when an option is selected.
00454 ///
00455 /// @limitations  "Close" menu item not provided. This might be added later.
00456 ///
00457 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00458 void CTreeTracerSelector::setupConfigMenuActions()
00459 {
00460     // Depth Limited toggle
00461     m_actionDL = new QAction(tr("&Depth Limited"), this);
00462     m_actionDL->setCheckable(true);
00463     m_actionDL->setChecked(m_traceConf.s_isDL);
00464     connect(m_actionDL, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), this, SLOT(toggleDL()));
00465     //connect(m_actionDL, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), m_aiConfigButton, SLOT(showMenu ()));
00466 
00467     m_aiConfigMenu->addAction(m_actionDL);
00468 
00469     // Iterative Deepening toggle
00470     m_actionID = new QAction(tr("&Iterative Deepening"), this);
00471     m_actionID->setCheckable(true);
00472     m_actionID->setChecked(m_traceConf.s_isID);
00473     connect(m_actionID, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), this, SLOT(toggleID()));
00474     //connect(m_actionID, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), m_aiConfigButton, SLOT(showMenu ()));
00475 
00476     m_aiConfigMenu->addAction(m_actionID);
00477 
00478     // Alpha Beta Pruning toggle
00479     m_actionAB = new QAction(tr("&Alpha Beta Pruning"), this);
00480     m_actionAB->setCheckable(true);
00481     m_actionAB->setChecked(m_traceConf.s_isAB);
00482     connect(m_actionAB, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), this, SLOT(toggleAB()));
00483     //connect(m_actionAB, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), m_aiConfigButton, SLOT(showMenu ()));
00484 
00485     m_aiConfigMenu->addAction(m_actionAB);
00486 
00487     // Quiescent Search toggle
00488     m_actionQS = new QAction(tr("&Quiescent Search"), this);
00489     m_actionQS->setCheckable(true);
00490     m_actionQS->setChecked(m_traceConf.s_isQS);
00491     connect(m_actionQS, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), this, SLOT(toggleQS()));
00492     //connect(m_actionQS, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), m_aiConfigButton, SLOT(showMenu ()));
00493 
00494     m_aiConfigMenu->addAction(m_actionQS);
00495 
00496     // History Table toggle
00497     m_actionHT = new QAction(tr("&History Table"), this);
00498     m_actionHT->setCheckable(true);
00499     m_actionHT->setChecked(m_traceConf.s_isHT);
00500     connect(m_actionHT, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), this, SLOT(toggleHT()));
00501     //connect(m_actionHT, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), m_aiConfigButton, SLOT(showMenu ()));
00502 
00503     m_aiConfigMenu->addAction(m_actionHT);
00504 
00505     m_aiConfigMenu->addSeparator();
00506 
00507     // SSS toggle
00508     m_actionSSS = new QAction(tr("&Allow SSS"), this);
00509     m_actionSSS->setCheckable(true);
00510     m_actionSSS->setChecked(m_traceConf.s_allowSSS);
00511     connect(m_actionSSS, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), this, SLOT(toggleSSS()));
00512     //connect(m_actionSSS, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), m_aiConfigButton, SLOT(showMenu ()));
00513 
00514     m_aiConfigMenu->addAction(m_actionSSS);
00515 
00516     m_aiConfigMenu->addSeparator();
00517 
00518     // Close button
00519     m_aiConfigMenu->addAction( new QAction(tr("&Close"), this) );
00520 
00521     //connect(m_aiConfigMenu, SIGNAL(activated(int)), m_aiConfigButton, SLOT(showMenu ()));
00522 
00523 }
